title: Brand New Luxury!!! PET OK, Coolidge Corner, Concierge, Gym, avail
posting_body: Brand new luxury apartment right in the heart of Brookline's Coolidge Corner.
New Construction due to be complete in August of 2016.
All units boast Caesarstone counter tops, hardwood floors, in unit laundry.
Steps to Longwood, and Coolidge Corner T stop and all the shops and restaurants that Coolidge Corner has to offer.
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
